website_summaries.verdict: This school backpack puts the fun in functional.
pros: Good-quality backpack that still has personality
One large interior and one small exterior compartment
Heavy-duty zippers will last through the whole school year
cons: You may end up having to buy one of these cute backpacks for everyone in the family

customer_reviews.title: Not my first one...
customer_reviews.text: I already had the smaller blue pencil case so I knew what I was getting when buying the bigger one. Obviously a returning customer so needless to say I like the product. I bought this one to hold my markers AND the smaller case which holds my colored pencils. I have a separate case for my other utensils, so this is my color case. Sure there are cheaper cases out there, but this one is just entertaining and special. I got it for myself but it would make a cool gift for a student. My little sisters always try to steal it from me to unzip the whole thing (of course I let them) banana for scale
customer_reviews.author: NotSoCommonSense

customer_reviews.title: Fun and functional
customer_reviews.text: Nice backpack. We bought it for our little guy who just started kindergarten. He loves it. It holds his lunch box and papers easily. It has one large compartment and a small zipper where the mouth is. When unzipped this looks like teeth. This pocket is more for looks rather than function. It seems sturdy enough for a light load. It's hard to say if it would hold up to heavier loads as he doesn't carry books in it yet. Side pockets will hold 16oz waterbottles, but fatter thermal cups slip out. Overall I'm very happy with it and so is our little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!
customer_reviews.text: My 1st grader loves this backpack. Its a little big but thats normal for a first grader. I ordered the smaller cersion and his books didnt fit in the backpack. He will have this for a few more years. Quality seems to be good too. I recommend once tou get it to register the product to get the warranty in case you need to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Th

customer_reviews.title: He was so happy with it
customer_reviews.text: My son saw a ZipIt pencil case at school, so we ordered him one and it came today. He was so happy with it. The "grillz" zip up inside when it is closed and that was the only thing he was disappointed about. I didn't realize until he showed me that it completely unzips into one long piece of fabric!! Pretty cool, but I could see that being a distraction if your child is already easily distracted at school. It seemed to be of very good quality and looked super cute. We will probably be buying him another once school starts next year in a different style. He loooooved it!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Smith

customer_reviews.title: I love this little guy
customer_reviews.text: I love this little guy. It catches everyone's attention. it is very unique and very spacious to keep alot of things. I will order another one to use as a make up or nick nack keeper in my big purse, since things always get lost in there. I totally love it. and I am a full grown adult. My college daughter has one as well, and she says she gets comments from classmates all the time asking where she got it, and how cute it is.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Leaf

customer_reviews.title: Cute style and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Super cute backpack with a fun look. We bought this for my son entering 2nd grade. It is a tad big on him but he will grow into it. Its definitely not "kid suzed" though it's a kids pack. Otherwise all zippers work great, it looks really cute and does what it needs to.
customer_reviews.author: Thais Macpherson

customer_reviews.title: back to school
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son he wanted something different that wasn't to "kiddy". He loves the face and its cool that it reflects at night
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but...
customer_reviews.text: I definitely would not recommend this backpack for kids in middle or high school. Perfect for my second grader who doesnt carry much besides lunch box and homework folder. Dont think it would hold up well with heavy books.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Practical pack that is good for a laugh!
customer_reviews.text: Practical, fun backpack. It was a gift and it took people a bit to see the face. I just wish the teeth were visible with the zipper closed on the pocket. Still, fun to see the face transform.
customer_reviews.author: Online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Kindergartener Loves It
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the mini version of this for my son to use during summer vacation. He loved it so much and received so many compliments. I was happy to find a bigger version for his first year of kindergarten! It fits his personality. I have not had any issues with this backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: My kid absolutely loves this pencil pouch. It fits well into her 3-ring binder, and provided her lots of entertainment when it came to unzipping and rezipping the entire thing. She's managed to cram unimaginable quantities of writing instruments in there, too. The only weird thing to me is that the "grillz" part isn't visible if you have the pouch zipped up, so it takes away some of the appeal of this particular pouch.
customer_reviews.author: X. Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome backpack! Fun and "cool"
customer_reviews.text: Awesome backpack! Fun and "cool". My son absolutely LOVES this one! He just started K5 so it is a bit big for him but not too bad and he loves it so much I won't be changing any time soon! Definitely recommend this! (And I will be looking for others should I need one in the future).
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Its a full size backpack
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this back pack it works perfect for him he carry alot of stuff in it so it is good material!
customer_reviews.author: Kasie Prather

customer_reviews.title: It is good but be careful to not unzip it all the way!
customer_reviews.text: Just a head's up - don't have your kid unzip it all the way or it will fall apart and be difficult to put back together! Aside from that, it has good quality and looks really cool
customer_reviews.author: Guest

customer_reviews.title: The children at church love keeping their pencils in this case. It's helping keep them organized and they get to name him.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought 5 more of these. They are adorable. I am using the first one at church in the bin where I keep my supplies for our childrens' group. The pens and pencils and small stuff are always just scattered everywhere. They children LOVED this little pouch with the big zipper mouth. They are coming up with all sorts of names for him. Now that's one very l-o-n-g zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Bold Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids loved them!
customer_reviews.text: Hilarious little smiling pencil cases which totally zip open to form one super long zipper! An entertaining feature. Grand daughters absolutely loved them... They added colorful lanyards through the notebook holes and turned them into cross body purses.
customer_reviews.author: DEW

customer_reviews.title: a good choice
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves this case. i panicked when she unzipped the whole thing into one big strip, but she just laughed and zipped it right back into shape. its super cute, and sturdy too. great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My son got this for school. It's a great pencil case, as long as that's what you're using it for. It's small so if you're buying it for pencils and pens great, if you need to fit more than that get something else.
customer_reviews.author: BoyMom2

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack
customer_reviews.text: My 7yr old loves this backpack ! I bought him a new backpack at the beginning of the school yr but he kept using his worn out bag from last year. I saw this bag and got it for him and he loves it !
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Dykes  $5 Accessory Vixen

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Awesome backpack! So far so good. No rips, no pulls, sturdy backpack and fits large water bottles on both sides. Got it in September and holding on strong.
customer_reviews.author: CapeCodNelly

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fits more than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable, I bought two of them for my kids, and honestly, I kept this one for myself 😁😆 its very spacey inside, I have over 10 pens in it. . My daughter loved it too.
customer_reviews.author: Zuleyka M.

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: My son likes his new bag. Its a little big for a first grader but he doesn't seem to mind the size. Seems to be good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: L.C

customer_reviews.title: Can an adult sport a Zipit Grillz backpack?
customer_reviews.text: Of course he can. This back pack is awesomely youthful, and takes the edge off this bow-tie wearing marketing exec. What fun!
customer_reviews.author: GL

customer_reviews.title: Unique, fun, cute, durable quality - even the eyes haven't fallen off after 2 years at school!
customer_reviews.text: Fun and cute. My son likes to use it and occasionally unzips it all the way to make a fun puzzle that I have to fix as well. Nice quality. No holes for a three-ring binder which I did not care about but should be noted.
customer_reviews.author: Miss C

customer_reviews.title: Fun product
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I am an adult and used an old strap to turn this into a cool purse.
customer_reviews.author: Fallon

customer_reviews.title: Fun product and great quality ! Great for school
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! Great quality and fun ! Fits everything he needs . Great for school
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I was worried it might be a bit smaller than I wanted, but I was wrong! I’ve got 100 colored pencils inside this pag, and they fit perfectly. Love the look! Super cute monster case!
customer_reviews.author: @0LadyLuna0

customer_reviews.title: A great backpack for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this backpack and the eyes and smile are adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag, it has personality!
customer_reviews.text: This bag can resist the rythm of a elementary school kid. Big for a small.kid. more adequate for a third grader and up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A hit!
customer_reviews.text: My son had wanted one of these bags but all the ones at the store were the same color and style, so I went on Amazon and seen this and purchased it. My son loves it the kids in his class loves it. Thank you! Fast shipping and no problems
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally delightful pencil case...
customer_reviews.text: Delightful!!! Though, I would warn that the black one pictured here has gold teeth that are not really visible on the image... This can easily be seen as culturally inappropriate... All the other ZIPIT pencil cases and colors are totally darling!
customer_reviews.author: P. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: This fits my sons personality and 3rd grade school supplies.
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today. Shipped on time. Product seems well made, has that fresh new backpack smell🥰 This fits my sons personality and 3rd grade school supplies. I even got a sneaky smile when he saw that it had a hood. I will update once item is used after a few months😉
customer_reviews.author: Yaser Darwish

customer_reviews.title: Very Spacious
customer_reviews.text: I have so many pens that I had to purchase this as a second pencil pouch. I was not sure how the sizing would be, but this is just the right size for all my pens. The gold teeth are quite shiny and the pouch itself is quite sturdy. I would recommend to anyone!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Cline

customer_reviews.title: The funnest pencil case ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest, most fun pencil case EVER!! The whole thing unzips into one long high quality zipper and then nicely zips right back into shape. The teeth and eyes are hilarious! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Cute! EDIT: but has a strong grease/fumes smell.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, looks so cool with the metallic "teeth". EDIT: I loved it once I opened the package, but there is a certain strong industrial smell that it reeks of. I can't pin point it, but it smells like grease or fumes. The product itself is not dirty or has any noticeable stains but it has a strong smell. Don't know if this was from shipping or what it can be from.
customer_reviews.author: oyu

customer_reviews.title: CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Highly recommend. I placed it in my glove box.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous, Burbank, California, USA

customer_reviews.title: Cool backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this backpack! My 5 year old son is obsessed with camo gear and he loves this one! Haven’t seen anyone else with this backpack at school, so it makes it even better! Haha. Very durable as well
customer_reviews.author: Alan G.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Case
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a "just because I love you" treat for my 6 year old daughter. She loved it! It's very cute and the the teeth are irredecent rainbow. Being larger and brightly colored, this will be easier to spot in her backpack. I'll most likely be picking one up for my neice.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super super cute!!!! I bought the little one too after I received the big one.
customer_reviews.author: Jing Wang

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is the perfect size for my 4 year old. Very fashionable and great material used. The price was just right and i would order from this seller again in the future. By the way, he loves the mean face with the teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: 💙
customer_reviews.text: 8 year old son loves it. He really likes that it completely unzips itself.
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this backpack. Has lasted almost 2 years now. no tares or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Marie

customer_reviews.title: 5 months of school, still great
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack, my son has had it for half a year of school so far and nothing had broken or gotten worn on it. He gets a lot of compliments on it also.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. Neige

customer_reviews.title: Cool bag w/questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the design of this backpack but the straps always loosen for some reason. It also has a whole in the bottom not from a tear but from the stitches coming loose. Super fun backpack but the quality is questionable.
customer_reviews.author: CaliHeat

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son for school because he had to have the gold teeth and no one in our area carried this one. He loved it and was super excited. Besides it being super cute, The material seems to be sturdy and hold up for what he will use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Newsom

customer_reviews.title: Cute as hell
customer_reviews.text: The zipper is tricky to close but it draws a lot of attention. All my friends like it. It's very unique.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Unique design
customer_reviews.text: Love the unique design. No other kid will have this in the classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Elle H

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: It’s soft and light, looks small but can put in many things!
customer_reviews.author: Queena Black

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works great! Can hold at least 20 pen/pencils My Grandaughter wanted it to match the change purse she received a couple years age. Both are holding up nicely after being carried around in a backpack
customer_reviews.author: CeeLee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality + Style + Room
customer_reviews.text: My sons favorite pencil case company! Each year I have to buy him a new one with a different design. Such a dope grill-zipper! Lots of room too!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea K. Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Mold
customer_reviews.text: Came with mold spots inside, had to return. Also this would have been too small even for kindergarten.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: 8 year old loves it! Great capacity and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Too small for my 8 years. I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Easha 4

customer_reviews.title: What do kids know, anyway?
customer_reviews.text: I bought some of these for grand-nieces because I thought they were adorable. They were pretty indifferent to them. Oh well. I still think they're cute!
customer_reviews.author: Coast Guard City CVX

customer_reviews.title: ZIPIT Pencil Case
customer_reviews.text: Holds all my colored pencils - 50 - and there is plenty of room for more. Very happy with this purchase. Got it quick too!
customer_reviews.author: Elke Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Very cool backpack !
customer_reviews.text: We get lots of compliments for this awesome backpack. It even has a hat cover & a zipper pocket storage for the mouth!
customer_reviews.author: Florida PlumberTop Contributor: Board Games

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: She loves her pencil case, and is -for whatever reason- fascinated that it zips open entirely. (?) It's an adequate size but certainly not large. It has the cute factor going for it. The material seems nice and thick so I don't expect any holes in it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Baum

customer_reviews.title: TOTALLY ADORABLE
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! It is so adorable! My mom thinks I'm crazy for having such a audacious pencil case but who cares!! It fits well in my binder. It came with a scratch on one of the eyes, but I mean it doesn't take away from that GRILLED face :)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sosa

customer_reviews.title: Cute and roomy!!
customer_reviews.text: So cute and different! My 8 yr old loves zipping and unzipping, and I like that it’s pretty roomy and a really fun pencil/crayon/scissor case.
customer_reviews.author: debrako

customer_reviews.title: Cheeesssseeee!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this and thought it was hilarious! I bought two and gave them as stocking stuffers, the girls loved them! They can't stop showing them off. Score!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: My littles love this! It's really fun
customer_reviews.text: My littles love this! It's really fun. Be aware you can completely unravel the whole bag if you don't tell your kiddos to stop unzipping.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for kids and grown up
customer_reviews.text: Durable and easy to clean up...perfect for kids and grown up... Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Familia Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: I've bought several
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with these. Great quality, perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Poimetheus

customer_reviews.title: 2 months of school and already ripped
customer_reviews.text: Exactly 2 months after receiving this backpack the zipper has ripped and there is a hole right where the backpack hangs in the locker. Cute backpack but awful quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: there's not a lot of pencil cases (excldng super heros) for boys out there
customer_reviews.text: Coolest pencil case in the world. My 8 yo boy loves it.... there's not a lot of pencil cases (excldng super heros) for boys out there, so this was fun!.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute! Useful!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to several kids (ages 13-19) and they loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Irene W.

customer_reviews.title: Great school backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great style & size. This is perfect for my 9 year old - it’s not too heavy and holds lots of stuff. He really likes it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only has 1 full size zippered pocket.
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea with the face. Just wish there was more than 1 pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Cute and adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice pencil case. I've got if for my 14 yo daughter, but I would be happy to use it myself. She has been using it for a couple months, no quality issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Anna B.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and useful!
customer_reviews.text: Used this as a coin pouch for my daughters briefcase. Like this she has coins for the charity box at school.
customer_reviews.author: DOVI

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Bought a green last year and two of ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Bought a green last year and two of these this year. The green one is still going. Talk about durable! Well thought out design, its just AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Cutest thing ever! I use it for work, and I always get compliments! Holds a lot of pens and highlighters, even my white out.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: and what kid DOESN'T like objects with faces on them
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pencil case that I've bought. My son loves it; the previous one was much smaller and this helps my ten-year-old keep more things...and what kid DOESN'T like objects with faces on them?!
customer_reviews.author: Thu Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great but small
customer_reviews.text: It is a great backpack. But it is a bit small! Would like it better if it was a bit bigger, like a regular backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Montfort Guerra

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my diaper bag and it's great. It's sturdy, cute, and just the right size to hold diaper cream, Chapstick, mini lotion, hand sanitizer, etc.
customer_reviews.author: C. R. McEnroe

customer_reviews.title: My fourth graders lunch box
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this lunch box a little over a month ago... it is exactly what you see in the picture normal size for a lunch box. Decent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Amos

customer_reviews.title: however when it arrived I was pleased to find out that it held more than I ...
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old wanted this for back to school. I was skeptical about the size and durability, however when it arrived I was pleased to find out that it held more than I thought it would and it feels very durable. I don't see having to replace it mid-school year! It's kinda goofy looking, but it's really cute and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loves this backpack, it fits my son's personality perfectly. Easily holds his folder, lunch box and toys he seeks to school. Seems to be holding up very well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: I love the grill
customer_reviews.text: Even though this is a pencil pouch I just un zip it and rezip it as a toy
customer_reviews.author: kenneth

customer_reviews.title: must have! great!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. I walk my kids to school and carry this on a necklace keychain and put money, coins and ID in it. Very handy and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Corrina Highley

customer_reviews.title: Great Camo BackPack
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this back pack! He said it could use another pocket for ‘pencil and stuff’. But otherwise ya a great bag. His class mates loved the way it looked.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Killen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and design
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit! My 8year old loves it! Amazing quality and design!
customer_reviews.author: Polkadotstripes

customer_reviews.title: Fun Gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my college roommate and she really enjoyed it. It's a fun case for those who are into weird little things
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: good size
customer_reviews.text: good case to carry around smell things in my purse and kids mini coloring books.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lim

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This was a major hit with our grand daughter. It is functional and beyond cute.
customer_reviews.author: William Bentrim

customer_reviews.title: This is really cute for a pencil case or Hot ...
customer_reviews.text: This is really cute for a pencil case or Hot Wheel cars, or any other collections. It unzips into one long zipper with eyes and teeth and then it can be zipped back into a case for storing treasures.
customer_reviews.author: Holly S. McClure

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: eAlways fun to give as a gift. No special occasion, just because.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Heavilin

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted this for school. She loves it and its been a big hit. We've had it for 5 months and its held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Selby

customer_reviews.title: Electric Purple Pouch is listed incorrectly!
customer_reviews.text: Note that when you order the "Electric Purple Pouch' it is not the one pictured or stated. It is actually a mini pouch- a fraction of the size. So disappointing as you can only fit a piece of gum in there!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Small but fits a good number of pens or pencils.
customer_reviews.author: Julia M.

customer_reviews.title: Sad, but true
customer_reviews.text: Everyone at work comments on it, had to buy a second one for my co-worker's 9-yr-old! Sad, but true, good for kids, better for grownups!
customer_reviews.author: Stella R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and holds way more than I thought it would. Highly pleased.
customer_reviews.author: M Schulz

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his new lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered this for my 9 year old and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A Chan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this so much. Very cute and it holds a LOT.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: very fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cute pencil case. It works great and always makes me smile. Pretty cool that it's one continuous zipper!
customer_reviews.author: MrsAliss

customer_reviews.title: Backpack
customer_reviews.text: The backpack was not very big. Had to buy a bigger backpack for our son
customer_reviews.author: Will hollifield

customer_reviews.title: Its awesome! Love that it unzips all the way
customer_reviews.text: I mean, c'mon! Its awesome! Love that it unzips all the way! Cute and functional and unique. The zipper is very good quality too. Haven't had a problem with it yet. :)
customer_reviews.author: Michal Dobosz

customer_reviews.title: Good teeth
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old loves this pencil pouch. The teeth that show when its unzipped are a fun touch.
customer_reviews.author: JDRanger

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Everyone in class looks at it and I’ll make it talk with it’s gold grill teeth. Hilarious and kills me every time I see it looking at me in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: James Cowart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect reaction.
customer_reviews.text: Hilarious. Please get one for yourself. I purchased this as a gift and the recipient laughed so hard she started crying. Perfect reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

product_meta.title: ZIPIT Grillz Backpack for Kids with Extra Side Pocket, Camo Green
product_meta.description:
Color:Camo Green| Style:Backpack

Whether you’re at school, around town or heading out on your next big adventure, ZIPIT Grillz Backpack is a cool, practical way to take along everything you need. The hip design showcases a tough persona with a hood, shady eyes and an exterior pocket that unzips to reveal shiny grillz teeth. It’s guaranteed to become a favorite. 

ZIPIT Grillz Backpack is more than just good looks. It features a padded back and adjustable shoulder straps for a close, back-safe fit. It measures 12.4x5.7x16.9 inches (28 x 41.9 x 36.8CM) delivering plenty of room for: 

 * Notebooks and binders
 * Tablets and gadgets
 * Extra clothes/shoes
 * Lunch, snacks and more


Lifetime Warranty

For even more value, be sure to register your backpack purchase on our website to enjoy a lifetime warranty against manufacturer defects.

Choose ZIPIT

ZIPIT is a leading bags-and-cases design house with products available in over 40 countries around the globe. We work hard to design practical products your whole family will love. Every ZIPIT backpack is carefully made and goes through a multi-stage quality assurance process before it’s available to our valued customers. 

We believe that everything we do should be done with genuine passion, a dreamer’s imagination, clever thinking and a smile.
feature_bullets: SIZE - Cool backpack for kids with a hood, eyes and shiny grillz. Measures 12.4x5.7x16.9 inches (28 x 41.9 x 36.8CM). With one large interior compartment, one small exterior pocket and 2 side pockets, you’ll have plenty of room for all your gear.
PADDED BACK AND ADJUSTABLE STRAPS - Carry everything you need in comfort thanks to the padded back and straps. The straps are adjustable for a safe, close-to-the-body fit.
STURDY AND DURABLE - ZIPIT Grillz Large Backpack features a durable polyester construction and smooth, sturdy zippers. It's well made to provide years of practical use.
MACHINE WASHABLE - This cool backpack can be machine washed on gentle cycle. Make sure to zip it closed before washing, and use a maximum water temperature of 30°C/86°F.
LIFETIME WARRANTY - Register this cute backpack for boys or girls on our website to receive our lifetime warranty against manufacturer defects. It's free.
